body: To add the AdRoll SmartPixel to your self-hosted WordPress page, go to your dashboard and select Appearance and then Editor. From there, you can view your Templates, followed by php files. Select the “footer.php”, scroll down to the closing body tag, and place the SmartPixel directly above it.
name: WordPress: Activating Your SmartPixel
title: WordPress: Activating Your SmartPixel
